title: Open required ports in a managed Kubernetes environment
content:
If the suite is deployed in a managed KubernetesÂ environment, you need to open certain ports according to your cloud platform.

EKS


You need to open the following ports if your corporate firewall blocks them. For more information, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/security-group-rules-reference.html and https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eks/latest/userguide/sec-group-reqs.html.

Source Source port range Destination Destination port range Protocol Description
External client * Bastion node 22 TCP Required for SSH access to the bastion node by external clients.
Internet * LoadBalancer 3000, 443, 5443 TCP Required for access to the installation portal, the suite, and the OMT management portal.
Bastion node * Worker nodes 8200 TCP Required for running the Smart Analytics reindexing tool (action_reindex.py)
Bastion node * Internet 443, 80 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with Internet (for example, when running theaws ecr get-login command.
Bastion node * Database server 5432 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with the Database server.
Bastion node * EFS server 111 TCP,UDP Required for the bastion node to communicate with the EFS server.
Bastion node * EFS server 2049, 20048 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with the EFS server.
Worker nodes * Database server 5432 TCP Required for the worker nodes to communicate with the Database server.
Worker nodes * EFS server 111 TCP,UDP Required for the worker nodes to communicate with the EFS server.
Worker nodes * EFS server 2049, 20048 TCP Required for the worker nodes to communicate with the EFS server.
Worker nodes * SMTP server 25/465/587 TCP Required for SMA to communicate with the SMTP server.
Worker nodes * LDAP server 389/636 TCP Required for SMA to communicate with the LDAP server.

AKS

You need to open some ports if your corporate firewall blocks them. Refer to the following table and open required ports according to your actual needs. For more information about AKS related ports, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/aks/limit-egress-traffic#required-ports-and-addresses-for-aks-clusters.

Source Source port range Destination Destination port range Protocol Description
External client * Bastion 22 TCP Required for SSH access to the bastion node by external clients.
External client * Database server 22 TCP Required for SSH access to the database server by external clients.
Internet * LoadBalancer 3000,443,5443 TCP Required for access to the installation portal, the suite, and the OMT management portal.
Bastion node * Internet 443,80 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with Internet when running commands such as curl, yum, and az.
Bastion node * Database server 5432 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with the database server.
Bastion node * Azurefile server 445 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with AzureFile.
Bastion node * Netappfile server 111 TCP,UDP Required for the bastion node to communicate with Netappfile.
Bastion node * Netappfile server 2049,635,20048 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with Netappfile.
AKS worker node subnet * Azurefile server 445 TCP Required for the AKS worker nodes to communicate with Azurefile.
AKS worker node subnet * Database server 5432 TCP Required for the AKS worker nodes to communicate with the database server.
AKS worker node subnet * Netappfile server 111 TCP,UDP Required for the AKS worker nodes to communicate with Netappfile.
AKS worker node subnet * Netappfile server 2049,635,20048 TCP Required for the AKS worker nodes to communicate with Netappfile.
AKS worker node subnet * SMTP server 25/465/587 TCP Required for SMA to communicate with the SMTP server.
AKS worker node subnet * NTP server 123 UDP Required for AKS to synchronize time with the NTP server.
AKS worker node subnet * LDAP server 389/636 TCP Required for SMA to communicate with the LDAP server.

GCP

You need to open some ports if your corporate firewall blocks them. Refer to the following table and open required ports according to your actual needs.

Source Source port range Destination Destination port range Protocol Description
External client * Bastion node 22 TCP Required for SSH access to the bastion node by external clients.
Internet * LoadBalancer 3000,443,5443 TCP Required for access to the installation portal, the suite, and the OMT management portal.
Bastion node * Internet 443,80 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with Internet when running commands such as yum install.
Bastion node * Database server 5432 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with the database server.
Bastion node * Filestore 20048,111,2046,2049,2050,4045 TCP Required for the bastion node to communicate with Filestore.
Worker nodes * Database server 5432 TCP Required for the worker nodes to communicate with the database server.
Worker nodes * Filestore 20048,111,2046,2049,2050,4045 TCP Required for the worker nodes to communicate with Filestore.
Worker nodes * SMTP server 25/465/587 TCP Required for SMA to communicate with the SMTP server.
Worker nodes * LDAP server 389/636 TCP Required for SMA to communicate with the LDAP server.
